alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Fayette; Franklin; Harrison; Henry; Scott; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 2:49AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WOODFORD...SCOTT...ANDERSON... SOUTHEASTERN HENRY...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...WEST CENTRAL HARRISON AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM EDT... At 249 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Owenton to near Frankfort to near Lawrenceburg. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Georgetown, Frankfort, Lawrenceburg, Versailles, Ballard, Midway, Stamping Ground, Sadieville and Longlick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Fayette; Franklin; Harrison; Henry; Scott; Woodford
